events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-04-30, resulting in significant damage to the front bumper and hood.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to reported vehicle collision and damages.
Agent Smith was assigned to handle the case promptly and reach out to the customer for further details.
The customer received confirmation that the claim for the auto accident has been acknowledged by the insurance company.
Requested police report, photos of the accident, and vehicle repair estimates to proceed with the claim investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including accident photos, repair quotes, and the official police report.
Investigation into the auto accident claim has commenced, reviewing all submitted evidence and reports.
The claim investigation was completed successfully, confirming the legitimacy of the collision and damages claimed.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs and damages sustained in the car accident.
Customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the prompt communication and settlement offer.
The claim for the vehicle accident was approved and is ready for payment issuance.
Payment has been issued to the customerâ€™s designated account to cover the approved repair and damage costs.
The auto accident claim case was formally closed following successful payment and customer acknowledgment.
